str2: Large, great, in the widest sense.
The wind; fig: applied to empty doctrines. From the base of aer; wind; by implication, quarters.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To blow, breathe, as the wind. A primary word; to breathe hard, i.e. Breeze.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably prolonged from hals; the sea.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To wake out of sleep, arouse in general, stir up. From dia and egeiro; to wake fully; i.e. Arouse.
